attributes.name: objectType
attributes.description: Indicates whether this is a shopping card (SC), purchase order (PO) or goods receipt (GR)

attributes.name: typeOfMail
attributes.description: Kind of email: Whether is approve/reject or Accept.

attributes.name: sourceSystem
attributes.description: Identify from which system we have received this mail

attributes.name: approvalMessage
attributes.description: Decision message can be displayed in the information tab and will not be mixed with Approver-model

attributes.name: totalValue
attributes.description: Total price of shopping cart/PO price

attributes.name: objectName
attributes.description: Name of the SC or PO: Description of the SC provided by user
